input: As a customer, I want to use voice search so that I can find products faster
expected: {"id": "US_046", "user_story": "As a customer, I want to use voice search so that I can find products faster", "quality_score": 0.71, "test_cases": [{"id": "TC_093", "type": "positive", "title": "Search using voice command", "priority": "medium", "preconditions": ["User is on search page", "microphone enabled"], "steps": ["Click microphone icon", "Say product name"], "expected_result": "Voice input is converted to search AND results displayed"}, {"id": "TC_094", "type": "edge_case", "title": "Voice search with unclear audio", "priority": "low", "preconditions": ["User is using voice search"], "steps": ["Speak unclearly OR in noisy environment"], "expected_result": "System asks for confirmation OR clarification"}]}
predicted:
{
  "test_cases": [
    {
      "id": "TC-001",
      "title": "Customer finds product using voice search",
      "priority": "high",
      "type": "positive",
      "preconditions": ["Device with voice assistant", "Product catalog available"],
      "steps": [
        1,
        "User says 'find products similar to iPhone'",
        2,
        "Voice assistant responds with product suggestions"
      ],
      "gherkin": {
        "given": "User has a device with a voice assistant",
        "when": "User says 'find products similar to iPhone'",
        "then": "Product suggestions are displayed"
      },
      "expected_result": "Product suggestions match user's query",
      "quality_score": 8,
      "tags": ["Voice Search", "Product Recommendations"]
    },
    {
      "id": "TC-002",
      "title": "Customer can't find product using voice search",
      "priority": "high",
      "type": "negative",
      "preconditions": ["Device with voice assistant", "No product catalog available"],
      "steps": [
        1,
        "User says 'find products similar to iPhone'",
        2,
        "Voice assistant responds with error message"
      ],
      "gherkin": {
        "given": "User has a device with a voice assistant",
        "when": "User says 'find products similar to iPhone'",
        "then": "Error message is displayed"
      },
      "expected_result": "Error message indicates no product catalog available",
      "quality_score": 8,
      "tags": ["Voice Search", "Error Handling"]
    },
    {
      "id": "TC-003",
      "title": "Customer's voice search query is unclear",
      "priority": "medium",
      "type": "edge_case",
      "preconditions": ["Device with voice assistant", "Product catalog available"],
      "steps": [
        1,
        "User says 'find products'",
        2,
        "Voice assistant responds with product suggestions"
      ],
      "gherkin": {
        "given": "User has a device with a voice assistant",
        "when": "User says 'find products'",
        "then": "Product suggestions are displayed"
      },
      "expected_result": "Product suggestions match user's query (despite unclear wording)",
      "quality_score": 6,
      "tags": ["Voice Search", "Ambiguous Queries"]
    }
  ]
}

input: As a customer, I want to contact customer support so that I can resolve issues quickly
expected: {"id": "US_020", "user_story": "As a customer, I want to contact customer support so that I can resolve issues quickly", "quality_score": 0.82, "test_cases": [{"id": "TC_041", "type": "positive", "title": "Submit support ticket", "priority": "high", "preconditions": ["User is on support page"], "steps": ["Click 'Submit Ticket' button", "Enter issue description", "Click submit"], "expected_result": "Ticket is created AND confirmation message shows ticket number"}, {"id": "TC_042", "type": "positive", "title": "View support ticket status", "priority": "high", "preconditions": ["User has submitted support ticket"], "steps": ["Navigate to support page", "Click 'My Tickets'"], "expected_result": "Ticket status AND history are displayed"}]}
predicted:
{
  "test_cases": [
    {
      "id": "TC-001",
      "title": "Contact Customer Support - Happy Path",
      "priority": "high",
      "type": "positive",
      "preconditions": ["Customer has issue"],
      "steps": [
        "1. Customer initiates contact with customer support via phone or email",
        "2. Customer provides detailed description of issue",
        "3. Support agent acknowledges and requests additional information"
      ],
      "gherkin": {
        "given": "Customer has an issue",
        "when": "Customer contacts customer support",
        "then": "Support agent acknowledges the issue"
      },
      "expected_result": "Issue is acknowledged and ticket is created",
      "quality_score": 9,
      "tags": ["support", "contact"]
    },
    {
      "id": "TC-002",
      "title": "Contact Customer Support - No Issue",
      "priority": "medium",
      "type": "positive",
      "preconditions": ["Customer has no issue"],
      "steps": [
        "1. Customer initiates contact with customer support via phone or email",
        "2. Customer provides general inquiry about product/service"
      ],
      "gherkin": {
        "given": "Customer has no issue",
        "when": "Customer contacts customer support",
        "then": "Support agent responds with general information"
      },
      "expected_result": "General information is provided to the customer",
      "quality_score": 8,
      "tags": ["support", "contact"]
    },
    {
      "id": "TC-003",
      "title": "Contact Customer Support - Invalid Input",
      "priority": "low",
      "type": "negative",
      "preconditions": ["Customer enters invalid input"],
      "steps": [
        "1. Customer initiates contact with customer support via phone or email",
        "2. Customer provides invalid input (e.g. incorrect email address)"
      ],
      "gherkin": {
        "given": "Customer enters invalid input",
        "when": "Customer contacts customer support",
        "then": "Error message is displayed"
      },
      "expected_result": "Error message is displayed to the customer",
      "quality_score": 6,
      "tags": ["support", "contact"]
    },
    {
      "id": "TC-004",
      "title": "Contact Customer Support - Time Limit Exceeded",
      "priority": "medium",
      "type": "negative",
      "preconditions": ["Customer has issue and time limit is exceeded"],
      "steps": [
        "1. Customer initiates contact with customer support via phone or email",
        "2. Customer provides detailed description of issue after time limit"
      ],
      "gherkin": {
        "given": "Time limit has been exceeded",
        "when": "Customer contacts customer support",
        "then": "Error message is displayed"
      },
      "expected_result": "Error message is displayed to the customer",
      "quality_score": 7,
      "tags": ["support", "contact"]
    }
  ]
}

input: As a user, I want to enable two-factor authentication so that my account is more secure

{
